title: "Using machine learning and computationally derived descriptors to find special classes of catalysts"
excerpt: "A team of researchers at RWTH Aachen University and the University of Jyväskylä has developed a system based on machine learning and computationally derived descriptors that can be used to find special kinds of catalysts."
